page.title: 14KINGSMEAD SCHOOL
page.content:
This is a private school with nearly 9 acres of land. It was founded in 1904 for boys, but now has girls also. There are 322 pupils, ranging in age from 4 to 13 years, some of whom are boarders. Children who board get up at 7.15 am and school starts for all pupils at 8.45 am and ends at 4.15 pm.
There is a large gym suitable for playing netball and basketball and an indoor swimming pool. Pupils can learn to play many different musical instruments and take ballet, drama and tennis lessons.
All children have a cooked lunch. Boarders have tea at 5.15 and bedtime, depending on age, varies from 7.00 to 8.15 pm.
